price: Siku tutayo yashambulia mashambulio makubwa, bila ya shaka Sisi ni wenye kutesa.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Watajie ile siku tutapo washika kwa mshiko mkubwa, wa nguvu. Nasi kwa mshiko huu ndio tunawatesa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
